translation: (suh) chuh (pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄) rḥmān.

Yymụ̄ (panh rsvli ʿrby ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm ya tihindi dhryʿh ansan) qrān hychhnvv. )yhi āyt vczh mkh kyn kạfrn th mshrkn hndi tmh alzam ks jvabs mnz zi Muḥammad ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslmn chuh )mʿāzAllah( kustam shkhṣ czvuri pạtthụ̄ qrān hyczhnavan.ḥvalh jatv khạṭr vchihv, tfsyr alqshyry, albghvy, alkhazn, albḥralmḥyṭ, aljml, allbab, alṣavy, ftḥ alqdyr, almẓhry, alsraj almnyr, almraghy, aẓvaʿ albyan th mjmʿ albyan vghyrh.(
Tmy kor ansan pạd.
Tmy hychhnvv suh byan.
Āftab th zvun chhe (tmụ̄ snzy ryaẓyạty mnṣvbh bndy san) mqrrh ḥsabh mṭạbq pkan.
Th zmyns pytth phhln vạlụ̄ bvutth th sạry kulụ̄ chih (tsụ̄) sjdh kran.
Th tmy chih āsmanụ̄kaynat (prth ṭrfh phhlạvth) blnd krith thạmcz th (tmy chih ryaẓyạty nẓm hyth tihnzi grdishh th hmyshh baqy rvznh khạṭr) t kr thạvmcz qạyim krith.
Takh tohụ̄ kriv nh tvlnas mnz be aʿtdạly (yʿny km ya zyadh tvuliv nh).
Th anṣaf san thạviv vazn tthyk th tvl kriv nh km.
Zmyn vathrạv tmy mkhlvq khạṭr.
Aath mnz chih myvh th khzrgurn.
Th kosh dar anaj th mushk dar (phl) pvsh.
Lhādha (ae grvhi jn v ansan) pnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Tmy bnvv ansan ktri hndụ̄pạtthụ̄ vazn vajinhi khoshk rbih nishhi.
Th jin krin nar lmbkh nishhi pạd.
Lhādha pnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
(sue) chuh doshvnụ̄ mshrqn hund mạlk th (sue) chuh doshvnụ̄ mghrbn hund mạlk.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Tmy krụ̄ z smndr jạry yim panh vạnụ̄ ralan chih.
Timn don mnzbag chuh aakh tthor tim hykn nh (pnnhi pnnhi) ḥd nishhi nyirith.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Timavdoshvyv (smndrv) nishhi chuh mokhth (yus sbz chuh āsan) th marjan (yymiyuk rng vozul chuh āsan) nyran.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Th thdụ̄ badban vạlụ̄ brrụ̄ brrụ̄ jhaz (thi) chih tmụ̄ snd (se akhtyars mnz) yim pharrn hndụ̄ pạtthụ̄ smndrs mnz chih (tthhrth āsan ya chih pkan).
Lhādha pnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Pth kanhh yus thi zmyns pytth chuh (suh) chuh fna spdn vvl.
Th tuhndis rb snze yvt dhat rvzi baqy yus ṣaḥb ʿẓmt v jlal th ṣaḥbi anʿām vakram chuh.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Sạry chih tsụ̄ mngan yim thi āsmann th zmyns mnz chih. Suh chuh pth vqth nvis shans mnz āsan.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Ae doshvyv (ansann th jinn hndyv) daryv asụ̄ phirvʿnqryb tuhndis ḥsabs kun tvjh.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?

Ae jinn th ansann hndyv daryv! Agr tohụ̄ aath kthhi pytth ṭaqt chihv thavan zi āsmann hndyv th zmyn kyv ḥdv nishhi nyiriv nybr (th kaynatuk tskhyr kriv) tylhi nyiriv tohụ̄, tohụ̄ yath thi (āsmạnụ̄ kurh kis) mqams pytthh nyirith gczihv tathi āshi tmụ̄ snze slṭnt.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Tohyhi doshvnụ̄ pytth yin khạlṣ nar lmbk svznh th (ryhh rus) dhh (thi yiyhi svznh) th tohụ̄ doshve hykiv nh timav nishhi bchith.
Lhādha pnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Pth yylhi āsman phatthi th (pth) gczihh dadimathi tyilkụ̄ (ya vozlhi chmrkụ̄) pạtthụ̄ glạbụ̄.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Lhādha nah yiyhi tamhi doh kạnshi ansans tmụ̄ sndis gnahs mtʿlq pczhnh th nah yiyhi kạnshi jin se.
Lhādha pnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Mjrm lukh yin pnnyn buthyn hndi kyhnyar sintụ̄ prznavnh pth yiyhi timn ddykh pytthuk ms rttith th khor n thph czhnth lmnh.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
(timn yiyhi vannh,) yohe chuh suh jhnm yath mjrm lukh ankar ạsụ̄ kran.
Tim krn tath (jhnms) mnzth gykhi vnis ābs mnz avr yvr.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Th yus shkhṣ pnnis rb sndis drbars mnz (pyshy khạṭr) khrra spdns khvczan chuh ts khạṭr chih z jnt.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Yim doshve (srsbzth shadab) gnụ̄ lnjhi vạlụ̄ (jnt) chih.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Timn doshvnụ̄ mnz chih z nag pkan.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Timn doshvnụ̄ mnz chih pth phls (th myvs) zz qsm.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Ahli jnt āsn tithyn bstrn pytth ddokh dith bihth yhindụ̄ aastr nfys th mochhi ryshmhi hndụ̄ (yʿny aṭlskụ̄) āsn, th doshvnụ̄ jntn hndụ̄ myvh āsn (timn) nkhh nman.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Th timn mnz āsn nẓr bon kun thavn vajinhi (ḥvur) yimn aamhi brvnhh nah kạnshi ansann chuh aathh lvgmut th nah kạnshi jinn.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Znth timh (ḥvur) yaqvt th mrjan chhe.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Nyky hund bdlh chuhnh nyky varạe kihinụ̄.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Th (tihindi khạṭr) chih yimn don hndi varạe byyhi z jnt thi.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Tim doshve chih tyz sbz rngs mnzznth kihinụ̄ basan.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Timn don mnz (thi) chih z nag yim sytthah bukh san āsn vuzan.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Yimn don mnz (thi) chih myvh th khzr th dạn.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Yimn mnz (thi) chhe khvb syrt th khvb ṣvrt (ḥvur).
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Ticzhh ḥvur yimh khinmn mnz prdh krith chhe.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Timn nah chuh godd kạnshi ansan ne aathh lvgmut th nah kạnshi jinn.
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
(jnty) āsn sbz qạlynn pytth nayab th nfys vathrnis pytth ddokh dith (bihth).
Lhādhapnnis rb snzn kmn kmn nʿmtn kriv tohụ̄ doshve ankar?
Tuhndis rb sund nav chuh sytthah brkt vvl, yus ṣaḥbi ʿẓmt v jlal th ṣaḥbi ainʿām v aikram chuh.
